title: Pesto penne with tuna
directions: Cook pasta in a large pot of boiling water, following package directions but omitting salt, until al dente, 7 to 8 min.
Drain pasta and return to pot. Stir in tuna with broth and oil, sun-dried tomatoes and pesto until combined. Serve immediately.
This quick meal sacrifices only minutes but not taste. It takes only four ingredients-tuna, pesto, sundried tomatoes and penne-and voila! A fuss-free meal ready to serve in minutes.
ingredients: 2 170-g cans chunk light tuna, in a vegetable broth and oil (do not drain)
